envs.rotations

envs.rotations#

Rotation utility functions from OpenAI’s mujoco-worldgen repository.

Functions have been extended to our 6D embedding.

https://github.com/openai/mujoco-worldgen/blob/master/mujoco_worldgen/util/rotation.py.

envs.rotations.mat2euler(mat: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray#

Convert Rotation Matrix to Euler Angles.

Parameters

mat – Rotation matrix.

See rotation.py for notes

envs.rotations.euler2quat(euler: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray#

Convert Euler Angles to Quaternions.

See rotation.py for notes.

Parameters

euler – Array of euler angles.

Returns

An array of quaternions.

envs.rotations.mat2quat(mat: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray#

Convert Rotation Matrices to Quaternions.

See rotation.py for notes.

Parameters

mat – Array of rotations matrices.

Returns

An array of quaternions.

envs.rotations.quat2mat(quat: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray#

Convert Quaternions to Euler Angles.

See rotation.py for notes.

Parameters

quat – Array of quaternions.

Returns

An array of euler angles.

envs.rotations.quat_mul(q0: numpy.ndarray, q1: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray#

Multiply Quaternions.

Parameters

  • q0 – First array of quaternions.

  • q1 – Second array of quaternions.

Returns

The multiplied quaternions.

envs.rotations.quat_conjugate(q: numpy.array) → numpy.array#

Conjugate Quaternions.

Parameters

q – Array of quaternions.

Returns

The conjugated quaternions.

envs.rotations.axisangle2quat(x: float, y: float, z: float, a: float) → numpy.ndarray#

Convert a single axis-angle to a Quaternion.

Parameters

  • x – X-axis component.

  • y – Y-axis component.

  • z – Z-axis component.

  • a – Angle around the axis in radians.

Returns

The quaternion.

envs.rotations.quat2embedding(quat: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray#

Convert Quaternions to Embeddings.

Parameters

quat – An array of quaternions.

Returns

The embeddings.

envs.rotations.embedding2quat(embedding: numpy.ndarray, regularize: bool = False) → numpy.ndarray#

Convert Embeddings to Quaternions.

The embeddings are assumed to have the form [a11, a12, a13, a21, a22, a23].

Parameters

  • embedding – An array of embeddings.

  • regularize – If True, the embedding is regularized to a proper embedding before conversion.

Returns

The quaternions.

envs.rotations.embedding2mat(embedding: numpy.ndarray, regularize: bool = False) → numpy.ndarray#

Convert Embeddings to Rotation Matrices.

The embeddings are assumed to have the form [a11, a12, a13, a21, a22, a23].

Parameters

  • embedding – An array of embeddings.

  • regularize – If True, the embedding is regularized to a proper embedding before conversion.

Returns

The rotation matrices.

envs.rotations.mat2embedding(mat: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray#

Convert Rotation Matrices to Embeddings.

Parameters

mat – An array of rotation matrices.

Returns

The embeddings.

envs.rotations.map2pi(theta: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray#

Map an angle to the interval of [-np.pi, np.pi].

Parameters

theta – An array of angles (in radians).

Returns

The mapped angles.
